Headline: #60 Blue Island/ 2th Temporary Reroute at Racine/13th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my ride?

#60 Blue Island/28th buses are temporarily rerouted via Blue Island, Roosevelt, Racine and over regular route: due to police activity near Racine/13th.

Allow extra travel time.
